trans-unit.source: Supplies a hash code for an object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um código hash para um objeto, utilizando um algoritmo hash que ignora as maiúsculas e minúsculas de cadeias.

trans-unit.source: CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider implements the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings, just as <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings.
trans-unit.target: CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interface suporte comparações sensível em cadeias, tal como <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface sensível comparações de suporte em cadeias.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> </xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: The objects used as keys by a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> are required to override the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface) and the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface).
trans-unit.target: Os objectos utilizados como chaves por um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>são necessários para substituir o <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método (ou o <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interface) e o <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método (ou o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface).</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of both methods or interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> might behave incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de métodos ou as interfaces deve processar sensibilidade às maiúsculas e minúsculas da mesma forma; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>poderá comportar-se incorretamente.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: For example, when creating a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, you must use this class with the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> class or any case-insensitive <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando criar um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, tem de utilizar esta classe com o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>classe ou qualquer sensível <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>implementação.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> class using the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> classe utilizando o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> instance is created using this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>é criada a instância de utilizar este construtor, o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>do thread atual é guardado.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the casing rules; therefore, hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Procedimentos de comparação utilizam a cultura guardada para determinar as regras de maiúsculas e minúsculas; Por conseguinte, comparações de código hash poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações específicas do idioma, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Procedimentos de comparação utilizam especificado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>para determinar as regras de maiúsculas e minúsculas.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Comparações de código hash poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações específicas do idioma, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to use for the new <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> a utilizar para o novo <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: culture is .
trans-unit.target: cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> do thread atual e de que está sempre disponível.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> instance is created using the parameterless constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>é criada a instância de utilizar o construtor sem parâmetros, o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>do thread atual é guardado.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the casing rules; therefore, hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Procedimentos de comparação utilizam a cultura guardada para determinar as regras de maiúsculas e minúsculas; Por conseguinte, comparações de código hash poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações específicas do idioma, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> que se encontra associado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> e que está sempre disponível.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Utilizam os procedimentos de comparação de <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para determinar as regras de maiúsculas e minúsculas.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Comparações de código hash poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações específicas do idioma, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> que se encontra associado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the given object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um código hash para o objeto especificado, utilizando um algoritmo hash que ignora as maiúsculas e minúsculas de cadeias.

trans-unit.source: The return value from this method must not be persisted for two reasons.
trans-unit.target: O valor devolvido deste método não deve ser persistente por duas razões.

trans-unit.source: First, the hash function of a class might be altered to generate a better distribution, thereby rendering any values from the old hash function useless.
trans-unit.target: Em primeiro lugar, a função de hash de uma classe pode ser alterada para gerar uma melhor distribuição, deste modo, composição inútil quaisquer valores da função de hash antigo.

trans-unit.source: Second, the default implementation of this class does not guarantee that the same value will be returned by different instances.
trans-unit.target: Segundo, a implementação predefinida desta classe não garante que o mesmo valor vai ser devolvido por instâncias diferentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> for which a hash code is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para o qual um código hash deve ser devolvido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the given object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para o objeto especificado, utilizando um algoritmo hash que ignora as maiúsculas e minúsculas de cadeias.

trans-unit.source: obj is .
trans-unit.target: objis .
